line_1: There was a Man of special grave Remark:
line_2: Pensive not sad, in Thought involv'd not dark,

line_1: There was a Man of special grave Remark:
line_2: As soot this Man could sing as Morning-Lark,

line_1: There was a Man of special grave Remark:
line_2: But These his Talents were ybury'd stark;

line_1: And on the drowning world remark:
line_2: I sit in window dry as ark,

line_1: Prove rather than impeach the just remark,
line_2: Such rare exceptions shining in the dark,
Seems always blund'ring in the dark,
